flawed_nl_solution:
Edith has already organized 60 files / 2 = <<60/2=30>>30 files in the morning.
She has files left to organize so she must still have 30 + 15 = <<30+15=40>>40 files in the office.
This means there are 60 total files - 40 organized files = <<60-40=20>>20 missing files.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
